translation.en: Once upon a time, there was a baker from Chicago.
translation.es: Había una vez una repostera de Chicago.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
That's me, Stacy,
who looks just like Margaret, the duchess of Montenaro.
translation.es: que es igual a Margaret, la duquesa de Montenaro.

translation.en: Stacy, me again, married the handsome Prince Edward at Christmas,
translation.es: Stacy, yo otra vez, se casó con el príncipe Edward en Navidad,

translation.en: while Margaret married my adorable best friend Kevin
translation.es: y Margaret se casó con mi mejor amigo, Kevin,

translation.en: right before she was crowned queen of Montenaro,
translation.es: justo antes de ser coronada reina de Montenaro,

translation.en: which almost didn't happen,
because her cousin Fiona, who looks like both of us
translation.es: porque su prima Fiona, que es igual a nosotras dos

translation.en: and is so over- the- top…
Maggie Moo!
…impersonated her in an attempt to steal the throne.
translation.es: …se hizo pasar por ella para quedarse con el trono.

translation.en: Luckily, Fiona was caught and sentenced to many years of community service.
translation.es: Por suerte, la atraparon y le dieron muchos años de servicio comunitario.

translation.en: I thought she should go to jail, but Margaret says she's family.
translation.es: Yo creía que debía ir a prisión, pero Margaret dice que es de la familia.

translation.en: Could Christmas get any more eventful?
- Well, maybe. -
Because this year, I'm cochairing
translation.es: Porque este año organizo un festival navideño internacional

translation.en: an international Christmas festival with Margaret,
translation.es: Porque este año organizo un festival navideño internacional con Margaret, mi mejor amiga en todo el mundo.

translation.en: who's just about my best friend in the world.
translation.es: con Margaret, mi mejor amiga en todo el mundo.

translation.en: And to commemorate the occasion,
the Vatican has loaned us the Star of Peace,
translation.es: el Vaticano nos prestó la Estrella de la Paz,

translation.en: a priceless relic that once belonged to Saint Nicholas himself.
translation.es: una reliquia invaluable que alguna vez perteneció a san Nicolás.

translation.en: The Star will be kept under guard until it goes on top of a ginormous tree
translation.es: La estrella será custodiada hasta ser colocada en la punta de un enorme árbol

translation.en: at our tree- lighting ceremony on Christmas Eve.
translation.es: durante la ceremonia de iluminación en Nochebuena.

translation.en: Oh, and that's Cardinal Amoah, the special emissary from the Vatican.
translation.es: Y ese es el cardenal Amoah, el emisario especial del Vaticano.

translation.en: Oh, this is so huge!
Can you believe this?
It's incredible.
I feel like we're making history.
Because you are making history.
Your Royal Majesty, Your Highness,
I present to you the Star of Peace.
translation.es: les presento la Estrella de la Paz.

translation.en: No one's getting paid a dime. It all goes to charity.
translation.es: Nadie cobrará por esto, será todo para caridad.

translation.en: Yes, we had a cancellation,
so there's one final audition to fill the spot in the program.
translation.es: y hay una última audición para ocupar ese lugar en el programa.

translation.en: Stacy and I are handling the details ourselves, so we'll be there.
translation.es: Stacy y yo nos ocupamos de los detalles, así que estaremos allí.

translation.en: All right, thank you for checking. Bye.
That's the last call I'm taking tonight.
Me too.
Oh, except for this one. Hey, Liv!
translation.es: Excepto por este. - Hola, Liv. - ¡Feliz Navidad!

translation.en: - Merry Christmas! - Merry Christmas.
Mm, we miss you, darling. How were exams?
A major pain.
I love the ballet academy, don't get me wrong,
translation.es: Me encanta la academia de ballet, no me malinterpreten,

translation.en: but they make you work really hard on the school part.
translation.es: pero exigen mucho en la parte escolar.

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing you can't handle.
Are you on your way to the airport?
That's why I called. JFK's closed because of the weather.
translation.es: Por eso llamé. Lo cerraron por el mal clima.

translation.en: The chaperone says we might leave from Bradley.
translation.es: Dicen que quizá salgamos desde Connecticut.

translation.en: Oh. Well, keep us posted.
I love you.
I love you more.
I'll sleep better once I know she's here.
Yeah. You and me both.
Come here.
Very good, Your Majesty.
Margaret and I love working together. Yeah, I'm sure we'll do it again.
translation.es: Margaret y yo adoramos trabajar juntas, sin duda volveremos a hacerlo.

translation.en: It's just right now we kinda have our hands full.
translation.es: Es solo que ahora estamos ocupadas.

translation.en: We would love to see the corgis as well.
translation.es: Nos encantaría ver a los corgis.

translation.en: - Absolutely. You can quote me. - Yes. And a very Merry Christmas to you.
translation.es: - Totalmente, lo afirmo. - Feliz Navidad también.

translation.en: - Thank you so much. Bye. - Cheers.
Well, that makes 11 ambassadors,
nine prime ministers, seven kings, four queens,
translation.es: nueve ministros, siete reyes, cuatro reinas,

translation.en: an entire delegation from Penglia--
And a partridge in a pear tree?
- Something like that. -
I'm so glad I have you to help me with all this crazy last- minute stuff.
translation.es: Qué alivio que me ayudes con toda la locura de último momento.

translation.en: We make a great team, don't we? Just like your dear old Chicago Red Sox.
translation.es: Somos un gran equipo, ¿no? Como tus queridos Red Sox.

translation.en: It's White Sox.
Yes, them as well. All the socks.
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ And a Happy New Year ♪
- Oh, bravo! - Fabulous.
- Thank you very much. - This way please, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.es: - Muchas gracias. - Por aquí, damas y caballeros.

translation.en: Maybe we put them after the yodeler?
translation.es: ¿Quizá podrían ir después del cantante tirolés?

translation.en: Do we really need a yodeler?
Well, we don't want to offend the Swiss ambassador.
translation.es: No queremos ofender al embajador suizo.

translation.en: We don't want to offend anyone.
Yeah.
I'm terribly sorry to interrupt, Your Majesty, but we have,
translation.es: Lamento mucho interrumpir, su majestad, pero…

translation.en: well, a bit of a situation.
This is Inspector Moretti, superintendent of police.
translation.es: Ella es la inspectora Moretti, jefa de la Policía.

translation.en: The police? Well, that sounds serious.
I'm afraid it is, Your Majesty.
translation.es: Me temo que lo es, su majestad.

translation.en: The Star of Peace is gone.
translation.es: Se llevaron la Estrella de la Paz.

translation.en: This can't be happening.
Isn't the museum vault under guard around the clock?
translation.es: ¿La bóveda del museo no es vigilada siempre?

translation.en: The guards were drugged.
We found traces of chloromethazine in the ventilation system
translation.es: Hallamos rastros de clorometazina en los conductos de aire

translation.en: that services the security office.
Surely there's surveillance footage.
The thieves wiped the hard drives clean.
Whoever did this came prepared.
We've notified Interpol, but with no forensic evidence,
translation.es: Notificamos a Interpol, pero, sin pruebas forenses,

translation.en: we've very little to go on.
Just please promise us you'll get it back in time for the ceremony.
translation.es: Prométanos que la encontrarán a tiempo para la ceremonia.

translation.en: I'm afraid that would be a piecrust promise.
translation.es: Me temo que sería una promesa vacía,

translation.en: Easily made, easily broken.
translation.es: que se hace y se rompe fácilmente.

translation.en: Oh dear!
We'd like to keep the investigation confidential until we know more.
translation.es: La investigación será confidencial hasta que sepamos más.

translation.en: Well, shall we notify the cardinal?
Since it's possible the breach came from within Vatican security,
translation.es: Como es posible que la filtración provenga de la seguridad del Vaticano,

translation.en: Interpol has asked us to hold off until we rule them out.
translation.es: Interpol nos pidió esperar hasta que lo descartemos.

translation.en: Just know we're doing everything we can.
translation.es: Sepan que haremos todo lo posible.

translation.en: Well, thank you, Inspector.
The relic of Saint Nicholas.
I mean, this is an international scandal of epic proportions.
translation.es: Es un escándalo internacional de gran magnitud.

translation.en: Let's just try to stay calm, okay?
Yes, of course.  Keep calm.
- I sympathize with you completely. - Thank you.
But when the crown jewels of Belgravia were stolen,
translation.es: Cuando robaron las joyas de la corona de Belgravia,

translation.en: oh, my grandfather, the king, was nearly deposed.
translation.es: casi destituyen a mi abuelo, el rey.

translation.en: - - Not helping.
But the jewels were eventually recovered.
- Well, bits and pieces. - Ah.
A ruby here, a sapphire there, a diamond, you know.
translation.es: Algún que otro rubí, zafiro y diamante.

translation.en: Dude. Come on.
There must be something we can do.
translation.es: Debe haber algo que podamos hacer.

translation.en: - - The police are handling it.
They have no clues and no leads.
Wait. If the police don't have any leads,
translation.es: Esperen. Si la policía no tiene pistas,

translation.en: then it's up to us to come up with something they haven't thought of.
translation.es: depende de nosotros hallar algo en lo que no hayan pensado.

translation.en: Like what?
Well, what we need is someone with information that the police don't have.
translation.es: Bueno, necesitamos a alguien que tenga información que la policía no tiene.

translation.en: Someone with connections to the black market,
translation.es: Alguien con conexiones en el mercado negro.

translation.en: and it wouldn't hurt if they were just a little bit crooked.
translation.es: Y no estaría de más que sepa manejarse por fuera de la ley.

translation.en: A little crooked?
Yes, indeed.
We need a person who actually thinks like a criminal,
translation.es: Necesitamos a una persona que piense como criminal,

translation.en: who has a history of never considering consequences,
translation.es: que nunca tenga en cuenta las consecuencias…

translation.en: and has absolutely no fear of breaking the rules.
translation.es: y que no tema romper las reglas.

translation.en: - If only we knew someone like that. - Fiona.
If anyone knows the unseemly side of things, it's my cousin.
translation.es: Si alguien conoce el lado impropio de las cosas es mi prima.

translation.en: I should know.
I'm sorry. Let me get this straight.
You want to employ the woman who, with the help of her cohorts,
translation.es: ¿Quieren contratar a la mujer que, con la ayuda de sus secuaces,

translation.en: masqueraded as you in an attempt to take over the country?
translation.es: se hizo pasar por ti para tener control del país?

translation.en: Didn't she go to jail?
Fiona's serving a sentence of community service at St. Michael's Convent.
translation.es: Cumple una pena de servicio comunitario en el orfanato de San Miguel.

translation.en: I was actually thinking of inviting her for Christmas before any of this happened.
translation.es: Había pensado en invitarla para Navidad antes de que pasara esto.

translation.en: You were?
I've always felt sorry for her,
growing up in boarding schools with no one to look after her.
translation.es: creció en internados sin nadie que la cuidara.

translation.en: I think this past year at the convent's done her some good.
translation.es: Creo que le hizo bien este año en el orfanato.

translation.en: Not that much good.
Look, it's not like I trust Fiona,
translation.es: Miren, no confío en Fiona, pero…

translation.en: but I mean, St. Michael's is less than an hour away,
translation.es: Miren, no confío en Fiona, pero… el orfanato está a menos de una hora

translation.en: and the police are stumped.
It would be unconscionable to sit here and do nothing.
translation.es: Sería inconcebible quedarse aquí sin hacer nada.

translation.en: What have we got to lose?
You know, anything and everything that isn't nailed down, but…
translation.es: Bueno, todo lo que no esté atornillado. Pero…

translation.en: …I can't think of any other ideas, so…
translation.es: no se me ocurre nada más.

translation.en: Kev?
I'll start nailing things down.
You missed a spot.
Where?
The library.
You know, the place with the books.
It's time for my break.
Need I remind you, Fiona Pembroke,
that you still owe 1,242 hours - of community service? -
translation.es: que aún debes 12 042 horas de servicio comunitario?

translation.en: Be that as it may, Mother Superior wants to see you in her office.
translation.es: Sea como sea, la madre superiora quiere verte en su oficina.

translation.en: Now!
Savage.
The sisters and I are absolutely thrilled
translation.es: Las hermanas y yo estamos encantadas

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke will be spending Christmas with you.
translation.es: de que la Srta. Pembroke vaya a pasar la Navidad con usted.

translation.en: She's the only family I have left.
translation.es: Es la única familiar que me queda.

translation.en: Well, and her mother, but I haven't seen my aunt in years.
translation.es: Bueno, ella y su madre, pero hace años que no veo a mi tía.

translation.en: I do hope Fiona hasn't been too much trouble.
translation.es: Espero que Fiona no les haya traído problemas.

translation.en: We are all God's children, my dear.
translation.es: Todos somos hijos de Dios, querida.

translation.en: Maggie Moo!
What a scrumptious surprise.
Oh, you're looking well.
What brings you to my private little corner of purgatory?
translation.es: ¿Y qué te trae a mi rincón privado del purgatorio?

translation.en: I thought it might be pleasant for us to have the holidays together.
translation.es: Pensé que sería agradable que pasáramos las fiestas juntas.

translation.en: Oh. Will I be mopping or dusting?
You'll be our guest.
After, uh, prayerful consideration,
I've told Her Majesty I could allow a discrete bending of the rules,
translation.es: le dije a su majestad que podría permitir una pequeña excepción a las reglas,

translation.en: seeing as it's Christmas.
As long as you promise to return by December 26th.
translation.es: Siempre y cuando prometa regresar para el 26 de diciembre.

translation.en: There's a hearing of the disciplinary committee
translation.es: Habrá una audiencia del comité disciplinario

translation.en: for which you must be present.
translation.es: en la que debe estar presente.

translation.en: We absolutely promise to have her back in time, Mother Superior.
translation.es: Prometemos traerla de vuelta a tiempo, madre superiora.

translation.en: You have my word.
Well, in that case,
Ms. Pembroke is free to spend the holidays at the palace.
translation.es: la señorita Pembroke puede ir a pasar las fiestas en el palacio.

translation.en: Sounds like a gas.
Thank you, Inspector.
Yeah, keep us posted.
Anything?
They thought they had a lead, but it didn't pan out.
translation.es: Pensaron que tenían una pista, pero no llevó a nada.

translation.en: We could certainly use some good news right about now.
No worries, royal six- pack. Good news has arrived.
translation.es: Tranquilo, alteza sexi. Llegaron las buenas noticias.

translation.en: Special delivery.
- Handle with care. - Hm.
Um, Reggie and Mindy? You gotta be kidding me.
translation.es: ¿Reggie y Mindy? No es en serio.

translation.en: Fiona agreed to help us, but she said she needed her squad.
translation.es: Fiona aceptó ayudarnos, pero dijo que necesitaba a su equipo.

translation.en: - Weren't they in jail as well? -
They were, but I, uh, pulled a few strings.
Well, it's good to be queen.
How's my fave cuzzie- in- law?
Fine, I guess.
I hope you ain't still sore over our little mix- up last Christmas.
translation.es: Espero que no sigas enojada por la confusión de la Navidad pasada.

translation.en: - Mix- up? - Yeah.
You kidnapped me! Okay. Still sore.
Spicy.
Why don't I have Mrs. Donatelli show you your rooms?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si la Sra. Donatelli les muestra sus habitaciones?

translation.en: This way. Please.
Meow.
Right, yes, uh,
meow to you as well.
- No respect. - No.
None. Cool.
Am I late for brekkie?
Only by an hour… or three.
translation.es: Solo una hora tarde… o tres.

translation.en: No worries. I couldn't eat a thing.
Hey!
But I do have news. I've been in touch with an associate
translation.es: Pero tengo novedades. Me contacté con un conocido

translation.en: who should be able to help us find our missing treasure.
translation.es: que podría ayudarnos a encontrar el tesoro perdido.

translation.en: Does this associate have a name?
I'd rather not say until he's on board, but trust me, he's the GOAT.
translation.es: Preferiría no decirlo hasta que acepte, pero créanme, es un capo.

translation.en: Sorry, he's… he's a goat?
Greatest of all time, babe. It's like a sports thing.
translation.es: No, se le dice así al mejor en algo.

translation.en: I knew that. I… I knew that.
I bet it's that count from Barcelona.
translation.es: Debe ser ese conde de Barcelona.

translation.en: Nah, he's a squirrelly one.
Never looks you square in the eye.
translation.es: Nunca te mira a los ojos.

translation.en: He's got a glass eye, idiot.
translation.es: Tiene un ojo de vidrio, idiota.

translation.en: I'll need to borrow a car,
and preferably a 'rari that matches my Manolos.
translation.es: idealmente una Ferrari que haga juego con mis zapatos.

translation.en: Don't worry. Frank will be happy to drive you.
Don't you trust me, royal boo?
Hell no.
And Bonnie and Clyde are staying right here just to make sure you come back.
translation.es: Y Bonnie y Clyde se quedarán aquí para asegurarnos de que vuelvas.

translation.en: - - Here? What are we supposed to do all day?
translation.es: ¿Aquí? ¿Qué vamos a hacer todo el día?

translation.en: Perhaps you could start by, uh, returning the silver.
translation.es: Quizá podrían empezar por devolver la cubertería.

translation.en: Reggie!
What?
Dear.
Right. Okay. Now look, I don't wish to be impertinent, Your Ladyship,
translation.es: Bien. Mire, no quiero ser impertinente, su señoría,

translation.en: but if you're not out in 20 minutes,
translation.es: pero, si no sale en 20 minutos,

translation.en: I have strict orders to come in there and fetch.
translation.es: tengo órdenes estrictas de entrar a buscarla.

translation.en: Bossy.
Remember! Twenty minutes!
You haven't lost your touch.
Some say.
You're looking well, Peter.
You too, Pemmie.
It's Pembroke.
You'll always be Pemmie to me.
So, how long has it been
translation.es: Bueno… ¿Cuánto hace de aquella noche que me dejaste en Barbados?

translation.en: since you walked out on me that spring night in Barbados?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto hace de aquella noche que me dejaste en Barbados?

translation.en: Oh, please.
We were always better as friends. Everything else was a complication.
translation.es: Siempre nos fue mejor como amigos. Todo lo demás son complicaciones.

translation.en: That's an interesting word for it.
I heard from Bianca the other day.
translation.es: Hablé con Bianca el otro día.

translation.en: Mummy's always had a soft spot for you since we were in nappies.
translation.es: Mami siempre tuvo debilidad por ti, desde que éramos niños.

translation.en: She says you won't return her calls.
I have nothing to say.
Oh, come on, Pemmie. It's Christmas.
Give the old girl a break.
If I remember, you weren't speaking to your father.
translation.es: Si mal no recuerdo, tú no hablabas con tu padre.

translation.en: No. I wasn't.
But I saw him last Christmas, two days before he passed.
translation.es: Pero lo vi la Navidad pasada, dos días antes de que muriera.

translation.en: And I'm very glad I did.
Well, now that we've limped down memory lane,
translation.es: Y ahora que ya nos atosigamos con el pasado,

translation.en: can we talk business?
The Star of Peace.
You want my help getting it back.
translation.es: Quieres que te ayude a recuperarla.

translation.en: Question is, why is it so important to you?
translation.es: La pregunta es… ¿por qué te importa tanto?

translation.en: Well, it's important to my cuzzie.
I treated her…  …unkindly,
so I thought I'd make it up to her.
translation.es: muy bien, y con esto la compensaría.

translation.en: Yes, I heard about your little escapade.
So, will you help despite our colorful past?
translation.es: Entonces… ¿me ayudarás a pesar de nuestro pasado pintoresco?

translation.en: You know the answer to that.
No matter what, no matter where?
Let me show you what I've dug up.
- Are you coming? - Mm.
Et voilà! The Interpol case file.
Interpol? I thought you left them.
That doesn't mean I've forgotten how to get around their firewalls.
translation.es: Pero no olvidé cómo sortear sus firewalls.

translation.en: - Oh. - According to this report, there are no suspects in the theft,
translation.es: Según este informe, no hay sospechosos del robo,

translation.en: but the interesting bit
is that chloromethazine was used to drug the guards.
translation.es: es que usaron clorometazina para drogar a los guardias.

translation.en: Why on earth is that interesting?
Interpol is utterly convinced
that the black- market supply is limited to an Asian distributor.
translation.es: de que solo un distribuidor asiático la vende en el mercado negro.

translation.en: And it is,
except for one disreputable pharmacist in Geneva,
translation.es: excepto por un farmacéutico de mala reputación en Ginebra,

translation.en: who runs an after- hours operation out of the back of his warehouse on Place du Port.
translation.es: que dirige una operación ilícita desde su almacén en Place du Port.

translation.en: Now, lucky for us,
there are security cameras all along the riverbank.
translation.es: hay cámaras de seguridad en toda la ribera.

translation.en: I searched through the last three days of footage and came up with this.
translation.es: Vi los videos de los últimos tres días y encontré esto.

translation.en: That's Itai Krauss.
Do I know him?
Indirectly.
He works for an old friend of yours.
translation.es: Trabaja para un viejo amigo tuyo.

translation.en: - - Hunter Cunard,
the billionaire hotel tycoon.
Why would a hotel tycoon steal the Star of Peace?
translation.es: ¿Por qué un magnate robaría la Estrella de la Paz?

translation.en: It's a little- known fact that Hunter's secret obsession
translation.es: Pocos lo saben, pero la obsesión secreta de Hunter

translation.en: is collecting precious items that aren't for sale.
translation.es: es coleccionar objetos valiosos que no están a la venta.

translation.en: Paintings, antiquities, jewels. He loves an impossible challenge.
translation.es: Cuadros, antigüedades, joyas… Le gustan los desafíos imposibles.

translation.en: You've been an invaluable help, Mr. Maxwell.
translation.es: Su ayuda ha sido invaluable, señor Maxwell.

translation.en: I'm certain the police will be grateful for the information.
Maggie, don't be silly. You can't go to the police.
translation.es: Maggie, no seas tonta. No puedes hablar con la policía.

translation.en: Why not?
Hunter has friends everywhere.
translation.es: Hunter tiene amigos en todos lados.

translation.en: One wrong word to the wrong person, and the Star disappears forever.
translation.es: Una palabra a la persona equivocada, y la estrella desaparecerá.

translation.en: So, what do we do?
The only thing you can do.
You steal it back.
How?
Every Christmas, Hunter hosts an exclusive soiree at his estate.
translation.es: Cada Navidad, Hunter organiza una velada exclusiva en su finca.

translation.en: It happens to be this Saturday night.
translation.es: Y será este sábado a la noche.

translation.en: Well, I assume security will be tight as a drum.
- Oh. - It will be, but there'll also be people coming and going,
translation.es: Sí, pero también habrá mucha gente yendo y viniendo.

translation.en: caterers, florists, guests, which affords us the perfect opportunity.
translation.es: Camareros, floristas, invitados… Es la oportunidad perfecta.

translation.en: All we have to do is make sure Hunter is occupied,
translation.es: Solo debemos mantener ocupado a Hunter.

translation.en: and lucky for us, he used to be quite enamored of Fiona.
translation.es: Y por suerte para nosotros, estaba muy enamorado de Fiona.

translation.en: Oh! So, uh, this bad boy had a thing for you, huh?
translation.es: ¿El chico malo estaba loco por ti?

translation.en: Oh, we had a bit of a steamy.  But he wasn't my type.
translation.es: Tuvimos algo ardiente, pero no era mi tipo.

translation.en: So, when was the last time you spoke to this Mr. Cunard?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que hablaste con el Sr. Cunard?

translation.en: A few years ago. We both moved on.
translation.es: Hace algunos años. Ambos lo superamos.

translation.en: If it's been years, how are you gonna get invited to the party?
translation.es: Si pasaron años, ¿cómo harás que te invite?

translation.en: Hunter walks his dog through the park behind the library
translation.es: Hunter pasea a su perro en el parque que da a la biblioteca

translation.en: every morning at 8:00 a.m., rain or shine.
translation.es: todas las mañanas a las 8:00, llueva o truene.

translation.en: Fiona will do the same.
I'm certain once they coincidentally run into each other,
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que, una vez que se encuentren casualmente,

translation.en: she can charm an invitation out of him.
translation.es: ella podrá hacer que la invite.

translation.en: Where is she gonna get a dog?
translation.es: ¿De dónde va a sacar un perro?

translation.en: Hm, I can pinch her a pooch.
Forgive me, but aren't you the Peter Maxwell who worked for Interpol
translation.es: Disculpa, ¿no eres el Peter Maxwell que trabajaba para Interpol

translation.en: and was, well, charged with a rather large- scale diamond theft?
translation.es: y que fue acusado de robar diamantes a gran escala?

translation.en: The charges were dismissed, but the incident tarnished my reputation,
translation.es: Desestimaron los cargos, pero el incidente manchó mi reputación,

translation.en: so I resigned and started my own private security firm,
translation.es: así que renuncié y abrí una empresa de seguridad privada,

translation.en: which has proven quite lucrative.
Mm- hmm. So what's your finder's fee?
- There is no fee. - Why not?
Let's just say…
I have my reasons.
This isn't a dog. It's bloody Big Foot.
translation.es: Esto no es un perro. Es el maldito Pie Grande.

translation.en: Pugsley's a pussycat. You just don't know how to handle him.
translation.es: Pugsley es mansito. Tú no sabes cómo manejarlo.

translation.en: I know how I'm going to handle you if I break a heel.
translation.es: Sé cómo me voy a manejar contigo si se me rompe un tacón.

translation.en: If I can have your attention…  …Hunter's just arrived.
- Location? - He's headed your way.
Oh, he's lush.
You'll intersect his path in 100 yards.
translation.es: Te cruzarás con él en 100 metros.

translation.en: Would you please get your nose out of that bush?
He just passed the latte stand.
Ugh, what seems to be your problem?
I don't have a problem.
Not you.
- No. No. - Pugsley!
Stop this at once! Naughty dog. Bad dog. Stop!
Dog!  Oh no.
Wretched.
My nail!
- - I've broken a nail!
- Where'd you get it from, a horse ranch? - Would you watch what you're saying?
translation.es: - ¿Lo sacaste de un rancho de caballos? - Cuida lo que dices.

translation.en: You couldn't have got us a toy poodle?
Oh, because poodles grow on trees.
Did she say poodles grew on trees, genius?
translation.es: ¿Acaso dijo que los caniches caen del cielo, genio?

translation.en: Oh, look, it's a poodle tree.
Let's pick us a white one, shall we?
- Can we talk about plan B? - Thank God there's a plan B.
translation.es: - ¿Podemos hablar del plan B? - Menos mal, hay un plan B.

translation.en: Peter always has a plan B.
Hunter's newest boutique hotel is unveiling its Christmas decorations tonight.
translation.es: El nuevo hotel boutique de Hunter presentará hoy su decoración navideña.

translation.en: He's planning a walk- through at four.
translation.es: Hay una visita guiada a las cuatro.

translation.en: It might be a bit difficult to get his attention,
but I'm sure you'll be up to the challenge…
- - ….once you freshen up a bit.
Excuse you.
Messy becomes you, Pemmie, but it's a bit overdone.
translation.es: El look desarreglado te va bien, pero esto es mucho.

translation.en: Here.
I hate to interrupt,
but if we're gonna get there by four, we better get on with it.
translation.es: pero, para llegar a las cuatro, debemos apurarnos.

translation.en: Yeah, just give me 20 minutes to moisturize.
You two aren't going anywhere.
translation.es: Ustedes no irán a ningún lado.

translation.en: - What? - What?
Do not ask me to explain why after what just happened.
translation.es: No me pidan que les explique por qué después de lo que pasó.

translation.en: - But I didn't do anything wrong! - Zzzt.
Now she's mad at me!
translation.es: - ¡Ahora se enojó conmigo! - No es mi culpa.

translation.en: - That's not my fault. - Of course it is.
translation.es: - ¡Ahora se enojó conmigo! - No es mi culpa. - Claro que es tu culpa. - No, no lo es.

translation.en: - No, it's not. - It is.
translation.es: - Sí, lo es. - No, no lo es.

translation.en: - No, it's not. - It is.
translation.es: - Sí, lo es. - No, no lo es. ¡Sí, lo es!

translation.en: - Hi! - Hi! It's you!
- Thank you for coming. - Thank you.
- Get ready. - Yes, ma'am.
Come.
I guess it looks fine.
Just remember, finish by five, or you're fired.
translation.es: Recuerda, termina a las cinco o te despediré.

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Cunard.
He's on his way.
Be ready.
Absolutely.
Let's make some merry, shall we?
- Welcome to Santa's workshop. - Thank you.
- I hope you've been a good girl. - Never.
Say mistletoe.
Mistletoe!
Have you been naughty or nice?
What on earth are you doing here?
I could ask you the same thing.
Well, age before beauty.
I own the place.
- You're joking. - Not at all.
Now it's your turn.
Well, the lounge here serves a candy cane martini that's to die for.
translation.es: En el bar sirven un martini de bastón de caramelo que es para morirse.

translation.en: Then what are we waiting for?
What about you? You been busy spending your inheritance?
More or less. It's all such a bore.
translation.es: Más o menos. Es todo muy aburrido.

translation.en: What ever happened to that dreary little rodent that you were seeing when we met?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con ese gusano con el que andabas cuando te conocí?

translation.en: Peter something.
- Peter Maxwell. -
That wretched little man.
Oh, you were quite stuck on him as I recall.
translation.es: Estabas perdida por él, según recuerdo.

translation.en: I don't get stuck on anyone.
translation.es: Yo no me pierdo por nadie.

translation.en: Oh, I'm well aware of that.
If I was a sentimental sort, I'd say you broke my heart.
translation.es: Si fuera sentimental, diría que me rompiste el corazón.

translation.en: Mm. We're quite the pair, aren't we?
- Cut from the same cloth. - Mm.
Which means we both know that you didn't just wander in here for the martinis.
translation.es: Así que ambos sabemos que no viniste aquí por los martinis.

translation.en: So why don't you tell me the real reason for this coincidental meeting?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dices el verdadero motivo de esta coincidencia?

translation.en: All right.
It's true I inherited Daddy's fortune.
translation.es: Es cierto que heredé la fortuna de papá.

translation.en: It's also true that there's very little of it left.
translation.es: También es cierto que ya queda muy poco.

translation.en: So you're here for a handout.
Oh, no. Not a handout. A proposition.
translation.es: No, limosna no. Tengo una propuesta.

translation.en: What kind of proposition?
Well, the Pembroke estate, it would make a darling boutique hotel.
translation.es: La finca Pembroke sería un encantador hotel boutique.

translation.en: You're not serious about selling.
Dead serious.
But Pembroke's been in your family for generations.
translation.es: La finca es de tu familia hace generaciones.

translation.en: If you're not interested…
Sit… down.
I didn't say I wasn't interested.
translation.es: No dije que no me interesara.

translation.en: Let's talk about this after the New Year, shall we?
translation.es: Hablemos de esto después de Año Nuevo, ¿sí?

translation.en: I'm insanely busy until then.
All right.
After New Year's.
- - Ciao.
Fiona!
I'm hosting a little holiday party at my home in the country on Saturday.
translation.es: Daré una fiesta de Navidad en mi casa de campo el sábado.

translation.en: Cocktails at six, dinner at eight, if your busy schedule will allow.
translation.es: Cócteles a las seis y cena a las ocho, si tu apretada agenda te permite ir.

translation.en: Will there be candy cane martinis?
Anything your heart desires.
Mm. Delicious. See you Saturday.
Oh, and, uh, you owe me a tango.
Good evening, Ms. Pembroke.
Well?
You took a risk, and it paid off.
Is that all you have to say?
translation.es: ¿Es todo lo que vas a decir?

translation.en: If Hunter wasn't utterly besotted with you,
translation.es: Si Hunter no estuviera loco por ti,

translation.en: he'd have called your bluff, and we'd be up a creek right now.
translation.es: no te habría creído y estaríamos en problemas.

translation.en: You're jealous.
I'm not jealous.
Oh, you're completely jealous.
- Do you want me to be jealous? -
Don't be ridiculous.
Because being jealous would mean there's something between us.
translation.es: Eso significaría que hay algo entre nosotros.

translation.en: - And there is nothing between us. - Absolutely nothing.
translation.es: - Y no hay nada entre nosotros. - Absolutamente nada.

translation.en: - Positively nothing. - Completely nothing.
♪ Like this I'm gonna show you ♪
It's Mummy again.
Just say hello.
That's all she wants.
But you said we would be together for Christmas.
I know I did, darling, but something's come up.
translation.es: Lo sé, cariño, pero surgió algo.

translation.en: You're gonna have so much fun here at Manderston.
translation.es: Te divertirás mucho aquí en Manderston.

translation.en: Look, Peter's staying as well.
There. That's settled, then.
Don't go!
Oh, Fiona, darling. Fiona, chin up.
Mummy's got a plane to catch.
translation.es: Mami tiene que tomar un avión.

translation.en: - I made this for you. - Oh.
Oh. Charming.
Ciao, bella. Kiss, kiss.
This is a 3D blueprint of Hunter Cunard's Montenaro estate.
translation.es: Este es un plano 3D de la finca de Hunter Cunard.

translation.en: Hunter's private office, here, is located on a separate wing.
translation.es: Su oficina privada… aquí, está en un ala separada.

translation.en: The adjoining gallery, here, is where he keeps his art collection.
translation.es: En la galería contigua, aquí, está su colección de arte.

translation.en: The entry is operated by a keypad with a six- digit security code.
translation.es: Para entrar, hay que poner un código de seguridad de seis dígitos.

translation.en: And once you're inside the gallery?
translation.es: ¿Y una vez dentro de la galería?

translation.en: The display case is surrounded by a web of laser motion detectors.
translation.es: El exhibidor está rodeado de detectores de movimiento láser.

translation.en: - We'll need to disarm them. - Dibs on the lasers!
I'm double- jointed.
It'll take a team of three to pull it off.
translation.es: Tenemos que ser tres para hacer esto.

translation.en: And then what?
This is an overlay of the internal camera system.
translation.es: Esta es una superposición del sistema de cámaras interno.

translation.en: One of us taps into the circuitry, overrides the camera system
translation.es: Uno debe conectarse al circuito y anular el sistema de cámaras

translation.en: while the other two break into the gallery and steal the Star of Peace.
translation.es: mientras los otros dos entran a la galería y roban la estrella.

translation.en: This is going to be like breaking into Fort Knox.
translation.es: Será como meterse en Fort Knox.

translation.en: We have little time to practice.
Everything must be perfect, or we run the risk of getting caught.
translation.es: Todo debe salir perfecto, o podrían atraparnos.

translation.en: And what happens if you do get caught?
Well, Hunter can't call the police
translation.es: Bueno… Hunter no puede denunciar el robo de algo que él robó.

translation.en: to report the theft of something he's stolen.
translation.es: Hunter no puede denunciar el robo de algo que él robó.

translation.en: In situations like this,
he has a history of making the problem disappear.
Forever.
We've forgotten the biggest problem of all.
translation.es: Olvidamos el mayor problema de todos.

translation.en: Which is?
I have nothing to wear.
You know, you never told us what our cut is for this little caper.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? No nos dijiste cuánto nos toca por este trabajito.

translation.en: Well, the cut, Reggie, is to spend Christmas with Maggie at the palace.
translation.es: Lo que les toca es pasar la Navidad con Maggie en el palacio.

translation.en: Truth is, we really do owe her a favor.
translation.es: La verdad es que le debemos un favor.

translation.en: Maybe,
but that doesn't explain Peter Maxwell.
translation.es: Pero eso no explica lo de Peter Maxwell.

translation.en: - Hmm! - Unlike the two of you,
Peter is an expert at getting past security systems without getting caught.
translation.es: Peter es experto en eludir sistemas de seguridad sin que lo atrapen.

translation.en: Oh, I bet he can get past your security systems, eh?
translation.es: Seguro que elude tus sistemas de seguridad.

translation.en: Excuse you.
Oh, admit it, Fif.
You're a smitten kitten.
There was a time, but it was long ago.
translation.es: En otra época, pero fue hace mucho.

translation.en: Nah. Reggie's onto something.
There's a little bit of flirty dirty going on.
A bit of do you, don't ya. Can't ya, won't ya.
translation.es: Quiero, no quiero. Que sí, que no.

translation.en: - Get out. - Oh, come on, Fif!
You gotta give us more than that!
Get out now.
All right. Don't get your knickers in a twist.
translation.es: Está bien, no te pongas loca.

translation.en: You miss your mum, don't you?
I don't think she loves me anymore.
translation.es: Creo que ya no me quiere.

translation.en: Of course she does.
Then why would she leave me all alone at Christmas?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué me dejó sola en Navidad?

translation.en: I'm here, and we'll always be friends.
translation.es: Yo estoy aquí, y siempre seremos amigos.

translation.en: Come here.
See that up there?
No matter where you are,
all you have to do is look up at the North Star,
translation.es: solo tienes que mirar la Estrella Polar,

translation.en: and you'll never be alone,
'cause wherever I am,
you know I'll be looking up at it too.
- Promise? - Swear.
No matter what?
No matter where.
- Can you just carry some-- - I know, I've got funny knees.
I'm just saying.
If you just--
Ready.
This is an approximation
of the motion sensor array in Hunter's gallery.
translation.es: de los sensores de movimiento de la galería.

translation.en: And here we go.
This is where it gets tricky.
Oh, I get it. You need a partner to boost you over that high beam.
translation.es: Entiendo. Necesitas que alguien te ayude a pasar ese láser.

translation.en: Precisely.
It's the only way of getting through to the control panel on the other side.
translation.es: Es la única forma de llegar al panel de control.

translation.en: Well, limber…  …is my middle name.
translation.es: Bueno, nadie es más flexible que yo.

translation.en: Yeah.
Dear God.
Let's reset.
Let me have one more go, okay?
Watch and learn.
Done.
You're up, Reggie.
All right.
Meet me outside?
Shall we?
Wait for it.
- A client lent it to me for the evening. - How very James Bond.
translation.es: Me lo prestó un cliente. Eres como James Bond.

translation.en: Come on, Pemmie. It'll be like old times.
translation.es: Vamos, Pemmie. Será como en los viejos tiempos.

translation.en: What's going on?
Oh, Fiona and Peter. They're really quite adorable together.
translation.es: Fiona y Peter. Son adorables juntos.

translation.en: They better be heading up north.
Why's that?
Storm's moving in from the south. They closed the airport over an hour ago.
translation.es: La tormenta viene del sur. Cerraron el aeropuerto hace una hora ya.

translation.en: Olivia.
She just texted. They've been rerouted to Brussels.
translation.es: - Olivia. - Me envió un mensaje. Irán hasta Bruselas.

translation.en: I thought I'd surprise her and pick her up myself.
translation.es: Pensé en sorprenderla e ir a buscarla.

translation.en: - When do you think you'll be back? - It's an eight- hour drive.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo volverás? - Son ocho horas en auto.

translation.en: If I leave first thing in the morning, I should be there by the time she lands.
translation.es: Si salgo a primera hora, llegaría para cuando aterrice.

translation.en: So I'll only be gone a day, day and a half tops.
translation.es: Así que solo me iré un día o un día y medio.

translation.en: It should be fine.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay?
I mean with everything going on.
translation.es: Con todo lo que está pasando…

translation.en: I'll be in meetings all morning,
and then there's tea with Cardinal Amoah, so you won't miss much.
translation.es: y luego tomaré el té con el cardenal, así que no te perderás mucho.

translation.en: - I'll miss you. - I miss you already.
translation.es: Pero te extrañaré. Yo ya te extraño.

translation.en: Where are we going? The North Pole?
Almost. Hang on.
Go ahead. Take your best shot.
translation.es: Adelante. Da lo mejor de ti.

translation.en: Looks like Santa's elves smoked a little too much mistletoe.
translation.es: Parece que los ayudantes de Papá Noel fumaron demasiado muérdago.

translation.en: Oh, I've got an idea.
Please tell me it involves alcohol.
Guess again.
Painting something naughty on those snowmen.
translation.es: Pintar algo obsceno en esos muñecos de nieve.

translation.en: Ice- skating.
You're joking.
You know you want to.
In your dreams. Oh, come on. It'll be fun.
translation.es: - En tus sueños. - Vamos, será divertido.

translation.en: For you.
How do you feel about polar bears?
No one can ever know about this.
It'll be our little secret.
So, you're really spending Christmas with your cousin?
translation.es: ¿De verdad vas a pasar la Navidad con tu prima?

translation.en: Well, better with Maggie than with Our Lady of Perpetual Pain.
translation.es: Mejor con Maggie que con la Señora del Dolor Perpetuo.

translation.en: Pemmie, it's quite all right to admit you have feelings for other people.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Está bien admitir que tienes sentimientos por otros.

translation.en: You've gone mushy since the last time I saw you.
translation.es: Te pusiste más meloso desde la última vez que te vi.

translation.en: - 'Tis the season. -
Speaking of mushy, may I have this dance?
You're determined to smother us in holiday cheese, aren't you?
translation.es: Estás decidido a ahogarnos en la cursilería de las fiestas, ¿no?

translation.en: You catch on quick.
Promise me you'll drive safely.
I promise. I'll be back before you know it.
translation.es: Te lo prometo. Volveré antes de que te des cuenta.

translation.en: Pete, old boy, is climbing the roof the only way to get into Hunter's house?
translation.es: Pete, viejo, ¿la única forma de entrar a lo de Hunter es por el techo?

translation.en: Yes, Reggie.
The trickiest part is getting back down.
translation.es: Lo difícil es volver a bajar.

translation.en: Can't we just take the stairs?
Let's go.
I cannot tell you how impressed His Eminence was
translation.es: No imagina lo impresionado que está su eminencia

translation.en: that you and Princess Stacy have been involved
translation.es: de que usted y la princesa se ocupen

translation.en: in all the details of this wondrous event.
translation.es: de todos los detalles de este maravilloso evento.

translation.en: Most people would let others do the work and take the credit themselves.
translation.es: Muchos harían trabajar a otros y se llevarían el mérito.

translation.en: Oh no, Stacy and I are…
are extremely involved.
As a matter of fact, she's in a meeting with the logistics committee right now,
translation.es: De hecho, ella está reunida con el comité de logística.

translation.en: but if she were here, she'd tell you how deeply moved we are
translation.es: Pero, si estuviera aquí, le diría cuánto nos emociona

translation.en: that the Vatican chose to honor our efforts.
translation.es: que el Vaticano eligiera honrar nuestro trabajo.

translation.en: Oh, we have not always chosen wisely. Oh no, no, no.
In fact, in the 16th century,
translation.es: De hecho, en el siglo XVI,

translation.en: we loaned the Star of Peace to Harry the Horrible,
translation.es: le prestamos la estrella a Harry el Horrible,

translation.en: the ruler of Caledonia.
It was a great mistake.
A band of thieves nearly made away with it.
translation.es: Casi se la roban unos ladrones.

translation.en: They were tarred and feathered,
translation.es: Los cubrieron de brea y plumas,

translation.en: but Harry was blamed because it happened on his watch.
translation.es: pero se culpó a Harry porque él estaba a cargo.

translation.en: - - The poor devil was excommunicated.
Are you all right, my dear?
Just overcome with emotion.
translation.es: - ¿Está bien, querida? - Solo… embriagada de emoción.

translation.en: I understand completely.
The moment you light up that tree
not only will the eyes of the world be upon you but also the eyes of God.
translation.es: no solo el mundo estará mirando, sino también Dios.

translation.en: I never thought of it like that.
Might I offer you a slice of yule log, Cardinal?
translation.es: ¿Quiere probar el tronco de Navidad, cardenal?

translation.en: - I shouldn't. -
- But it is Christmas.  - Please help yourself.
translation.es: No debería, pero es Navidad. Por favor, sírvase.

translation.en: What in heaven's name was that?
That was the yodeler rehearsing for the ceremony.
translation.es: - ¿Qué diablos fue eso? - Era… el cantante tirolés, que ensaya para la ceremonia.

translation.en: The poor fellow sounded a bit hoarse.
translation.es: El pobre sonaba un poco ronco.

translation.en: Which is why he needs to practice.
The doctor said it's just a sprain.
There is no way you can climb up the side of a building.
translation.es: No vas a poder subir a ningún techo.

translation.en: I could supervise from the van.
- You're not supervising me, mate. - Wh--
translation.es: A mí no vas a supervisarme.

translation.en: We still need two people to get around security in the gallery.
translation.es: Aún debemos ser dos para eludir los sensores de la galería.

translation.en: Mindy can't do it. She's handling the cameras.
translation.es: Mindy no puede, ella se ocupará de las cámaras.

translation.en: Why not let Fifi do it? She had the moves down cold.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo hace Fifi? Esquivó bien los sensores láser.

translation.en: Fiona will be with Hunter.
I'm afraid we're back to square one. We'll have to come up with something else.
translation.es: Volvemos al principio. Hay que pensar en otra cosa.

translation.en: But there isn't time to come up with something else.
Pay attention, Betty Crocker. I can't be at two places at once.
translation.es: Presta atención, Betty Crocker. No puedo estar en dos lugares a la vez.

translation.en: - Wait a minute. - Darling.
Maybe she could.
What was that, Frank?
Forgive me for pointing out the obvious,
translation.es: Perdóneme por señalar lo obvio, alteza,

translation.en: but if Ms. Pembroke could successfully impersonate Her Majesty,
translation.es: pero, si la Srta. Pembroke pudo hacerse pasar por su majestad,

translation.en: it stands to reason that Her Majesty could impersonate Ms. Pembroke.
translation.es: su majestad debería poder hacerse pasar por la Srta. Pembroke.

translation.en: - Not in a million years. -
Bite your tongue.
- It's completely out of the question. - Certainly, sir. I…
I was just thinking out loud. How very stupid of me.
translation.es: Estaba pensando en voz alta, qué estúpido soy.

translation.en: That's all right, Frank. We all come up with bad ideas now and again.
translation.es: Está bien. Todos tenemos malas ideas de vez en cuando.

translation.en: - Indeed. - It is an outrageous idea.
translation.es: - Así es. - Es una idea descabellada.

translation.en: But I did switch places with Stacy twice, and no one was the wiser.
translation.es: Pero intercambié lugares con Stacy dos veces, y nadie se dio cuenta.

translation.en: Trading places with Ms. Pembroke?
That's a different matter entirely.
Yeah, but all she'd have to do is keep Hunter busy
translation.es: Pero solo tendría que mantener ocupado a Hunter

translation.en: while they break into the gallery.
translation.es: mientras ellos entran a la galería.

translation.en: The whole thing should take less than an hour.
translation.es: No debería llevar más una hora.

translation.en: You can't be serious.
It really isn't that long.
Listen to me.
Hunter Cunard is a dangerous and complicated man.
translation.es: Hunter Cunard es un hombre peligroso y complicado.

translation.en: No, Maggie could never pull it off.
Why not?
Well, not to be unkind, Moo,
but you certainly don't have the, uh…  …je ne sais quoi.
translation.es: pero no tienes ese… je ne sais quoi.

translation.en: Minions, fetch me my champagne.
I do not sound like that.
Hello, royal six- pack.
Oh. Well, you sound exactly like that.
- I do not. - You do.
- But I don't. - But you do.
- But I don't. - You really do.
- But I-- - Zzzst.
Oh, she's good.
Look, I have to object. It's… it's far too risky.
translation.es: Tengo que oponerme, es demasiado arriesgado.

translation.en: If it means recovering the Star…
translation.es: Si es para recuperar la estrella…

translation.en: …it's a risk I'm willing to take.
Indeed.
Well, here we go again.
No, arch your back.
More.
Ugh, never mind.
What you need to do is tap into the video feed,
translation.es: Tienes que acceder a la señal de video, grabar cinco segundos,

translation.en: record five seconds, switch to playback, and route that through the auxiliary feed.
translation.es: Tienes que acceder a la señal de video, grabar cinco segundos, hacer que se repita y enviarlo por el canal auxiliar.

translation.en: - You got it? - Got it.
Ready?
Oh dear.
And one, two, three, four.
One, two, three, four.
One, two, three. You're starting to get the hang of it.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres. Le estás agarrando la mano.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
Now, swing those hips.
I feel like I am.
Now you've got it. Let them know you're…
translation.es: Eso es. Hazles saber que eres…

translation.en: Hunter and I met five years ago.
translation.es: Conocí a Hunter hace cinco años.

translation.en: He plays tennis and polo, which is a total bore,
translation.es: Juega al tenis y al polo, que es muy aburrido,

translation.en: but he can't resist a good martini.
translation.es: pero no puede resistirse a un buen martini.

translation.en: I told him I wanted to sell Pembroke.
translation.es: Le dije que quería vender Pembroke.

found the keypad.

And it's my daughter.
Fiona. Fiona…
I love you more than anything or anyone.
translation.es: Te quiero más que a nada ni a nadie.

translation.en: I always have.
Do you have any idea what it was like
trying to be good enough to be noticed by you?
translation.es: tratar de ser lo bastante buena para llamar tu atención?

translation.en: Trying to be good enough to matter to you?
translation.es: ¿Tratar de ser lo bastante buena para importarte?

translation.en: Better than you think.
Oh no, that is a lie.
You always had somewhere else you had to be.
translation.es: Siempre había otro lugar al que tenías que ir.

translation.en: You always had a plane to catch.
translation.es: Siempre tenías que tomar un avión.

translation.en: I was running away.
- - No, not from you.
Never from you.
Your father was…
Your father was cruel to me,
and rather than suffer it,
I did whatever I could to get as far away from him as possible.
translation.es: hice todo lo que pude para alejarme lo más posible de él.

translation.en: Oh, so you're here to make excuses.
translation.es: Así que viniste a dar excusas.

translation.en: No, there's… there's no excuse for what I did.
translation.es: No, no hay excusas para lo que hice.

translation.en: You're damned right there isn't.
I've carried this around for years.
translation.es: Hace años que llevo esto conmigo.

translation.en: Do you remember?
You gave it to me when you were ten.
translation.es: Me lo diste cuando tenías diez años.

translation.en: When I was here, I used to steal little trinkets,
translation.es: Cuando estaba aquí, siempre robaba baratijas

translation.en: wrap them up so that on Christmas, I could open them and pretend they were from you.
translation.es: y las envolvía para abrirlas en Navidad y hacer de cuenta que eran de parte tuya.

translation.en: I loved you so much, and I tried.
translation.es: Te quería muchísimo, y me esforcé.

translation.en: I tried so hard not to care that I wasn't worthy of being loved back.
translation.es: Me esforcé mucho para que no me importara no ser merecedora de tu afecto.

translation.en: Oh, Fiona, you wonderful, perfect little girl. I…
translation.es: Fiona… - Déjame. - Eras una niña maravillosa.

translation.en: I was a wretched mother,
and even though I don't deserve it,
I'm… I'm hoping that you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
translation.es: espero que puedas llegar a perdonarme.

translation.en: Please, darling. Just give me a second chance.
translation.es: Por favor, cariño. Dame otra oportunidad.

translation.en: Well, who knows how many Christmases we have left, you and I?
translation.es: ¿Quién sabe cuántas Navidades nos quedan juntas?

translation.en: It's too late.
Fiona.
♪ You've been on my mind ♪ ♪ On my mind ♪
Hey! Come on, Fifi!
We've got a plane to catch.
Fifi.
- What? - Where you going? Come back!
Come back! We've got a flight to catch!
- What you doing? We've got to go! - Come back! We can't drive this!
Oh, darling.
Shh, shh. It's okay. It's okay.
- ♪ Home is where the love is ♪ - It's okay.
Hey, everything is gonna be okay. I promise.
translation.es: Oye, todo va a salir bien. Te lo prometo.

translation.en: Right this way, please.
Cardinal Amoah, Inspector Moretti,
so good of you to come on such short notice.
translation.es: qué bueno que vinieran tan rápido.

translation.en: Your message said it was urgent.
I'm feeling a little bit queasy.
Please take a seat.
I do hope everything is all right.
- Um-- - It isn't all right.
- - It's fabulous, darling.
We gave the old thing a bit of a polish.
I do hope you don't mind, Your Eminence.
Mind? It looks spectacular. Gratias ago Deo.
translation.es: ¿Molestarme? Se ve increíble. Gratias ago Deo.

translation.en: Hm? Botticelli, Versace.
Aw, Auntie Bianca, what a pleasure to see you again.
translation.es: Tía Bianca, me alegra volver a verte.

translation.en: - Pleasure to be seen. -
And who do we have here?
Mummy, please.
So, will the two of you be staying with us for Christmas?
translation.es: ¿Ambas se quedarán a pasar la Navidad con nosotros?

translation.en: Well, if it's all right with Maggie Moo.
translation.es: Si a Maggie Moo no le molesta.

translation.en: All right?
We'd be delighted to have you. You're family.
translation.es: Nos encantaría que estén. Son de la familia.

translation.en: I suppose we are.
Um, Fiona?
I know you and I don't have that much in common,
translation.es: Sé que no tenemos mucho en común…

translation.en: really anything in common.
I just want to say I'm really grateful for all you've done.
translation.es: Solo quiero decirte que agradezco mucho todo lo que hiciste.

translation.en: - You could have just disappeared. - Oh, I've actually given up disappearing.
translation.es: Podrías haber desaparecido. Ya no desapareceré más.

translation.en: Glad to hear it.
By the way, how did you convince Peter to give you back the Star?
translation.es: Por cierto, ¿cómo convenciste a Peter de que te devolviera la estrella?

translation.en: Oh yeah.
He intended to, all along.
So does that mean he'll be joining us for Christmas?
Peter and I decided to go our separate ways.
Oh no.
I'm so sorry. Don't be. It's for the best.
translation.es: - Lo lamento mucho. - No lo lamentes. Es lo mejor.

translation.en: I think you need a hug. Please, no.
translation.es: - Necesitas un abrazo. - Por favor, no.

translation.en: No… There it is.
Hey, my family is from the Philippines. We do hugs.
translation.es: Bueno, mi familia es de Filipinas. Damos abrazos.

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop, the reindeer pause ♪
♪ Out jumps good ol' Santa Claus ♪
♪ Down through the chimney With lots of toys ♪
♪ All for the little ones Christmas joys ♪
- ♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪ -
translation.es: ¡Jo, jo, jo! Vamos tú y yo.

translation.en: ♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪
translation.es: ¡Jo, jo, jo! Vamos tú y yo.

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop Click, click, click ♪
translation.es: Sobre el tejado, clic, clic, clic.

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With good Saint Nick ♪
translation.es: Por la chimenea con Papá Noel…

translation.en: After all we went through, it's a miracle this came together.
translation.es: Después de todo lo que pasamos, es un milagro haber logrado esto.

translation.en: Ah, I knew it would.
You didn't tell me what happened to Hunter Cunard.
translation.es: No me dijiste qué pasó con Cunard.

translation.en: Oh, the police arrested him last night trying to flee the country.
translation.es: Lo arrestaron anoche cuando intentaba huir del país.

translation.en: Guessing he's gonna spend a long time in jail.
translation.es: Supongo que pasará mucho tiempo en la cárcel.

translation.en: Well, deservedly so.
I gave them the diamond bracelet as well.
translation.es: Y devolví la pulsera de diamantes.

translation.en: Did you happen to keep those red heels?
Kevin!
I couldn't be more proud of you and Queen Margaret, of course,
translation.es: No podría estar más orgulloso de ti y de la reina Margaret, claro,

translation.en: for putting together a beautiful event like this.
translation.es: por organizar un evento tan lindo.

translation.en: Well, I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.es: No podría haberlo hecho sin ti.

translation.en: Well, I dare say we make a great team.
translation.es: Creo que somos un gran equipo.

translation.en: Just like that dashing chap who dresses up like a bat
translation.es: Como ese tipo apuesto que se viste de murciélago

translation.en: and his, uh, beautiful catlike companion.
Babe, Batman and Catwoman aren't a team.
translation.es: Cariño, Batman y Gatúbela no son un equipo.

translation.en: Of course they are.
I love you.
Cheers, darling.
You know, this is the best Christmas I have ever had.
translation.es: Esta es la mejor Navidad que he tenido, ¿sabes?

translation.en: Oh, because someone spiked the eggnog?
No, it's because I have my beautiful daughter back.
translation.es: No, porque recuperé a mi hermosa hija.

translation.en: So, is this how it's going to be between us?
translation.es: ¿Así va a ser nuestra relación ahora?

translation.en: All gooey and sentimental?
Mm- hmm. Oh yeah. Come here.
Merry Christmas, darling. Merry Christmas, Mummy.
translation.es: - Feliz Navidad, cariño. - Feliz Navidad, mami.

translation.en: Love you.
Guru Adishankar, it's so lovely to see you.
I'm so happy!
- I'm so glad we're together. - Oh my!
- Look at this guy! -
You! You look bangin', bro.
Well, hello, Mr. Handsome.
Talk about clichés.
translation.es: Este sí que es un cliché.

translation.en: Beautiful woman, alone on Christmas, gazing up at the night sky.
translation.es: Una mujer hermosa sola en Navidad mirando el cielo nocturno.

translation.en: Hm. I expected better from you.
I didn't think I'd see you again.
translation.es: No pensé que volvería a verte.

translation.en: I was mad at you, Pemmie,
because you didn't care about me as much as I cared about you.
translation.es: que yo no te importara tanto como tú me importas a mí.

translation.en: And that's not a good reason to be mad at someone, so…
translation.es: Y ese no es un buen motivo para enojarse con alguien…

translation.en: so I came back to apologize.
It's my turn to apologize.
You were right.
I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.es: No me abro con nadie, siempre me sentí más segura así.

translation.en: But now?
It's what Mummy said.
We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.es: Nunca sabemos cuánto tiempo nos queda con las personas que queremos…

translation.en: And we can't waste it.
Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.es: Prométeme que no perderemos más tiempo.

translation.en: I promise.
Swear.
No matter what.
No matter where.
Ladies and gentlemen, before we light our tree,
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, antes de iluminar el árbol,

translation.en: we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are
translation.es: solo queríamos decirles lo felices y agradecidos que estamos

translation.en: that you all are here tonight.
And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.es: Y lo que más esperamos es que el espíritu navideño de bondad y amor

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.es: llene el mundo y brille tan intensamente como la Estrella de la Paz.

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.es: Sin más preámbulos, princesa Olivia, ¿harías los honores?

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
♪ 'Tis the season to be jolly ♪
translation.es: Qué feliz se siente el alma.

translation.en: ♪ Don we now our gay apparel ♪
Oh my God! Phew!
